snippet: Sudhir Venkatesh is a rising star in sociology for his research on poverty and gang life, but his methods have led to questions from colleagues and a grueling inquiry by Columbia University.
abstract: Some colleagues of Sudhir Venkatesh, sociologist whose research into gangs and prostitutes has given his field broad appeal, contend that Venkatesh has taken liberties not appropriate to a scholar in his quest for readership; Venkatesh was subject of grueling Columbia University investigation into quarter-million dollars of spending that auditors said was insufficiently documented, misappropriated or outright fabricated.
lead_paragraph: Sudhir Venkatesh is a rising star in sociology for his research on poverty and gang life, but his methods have led to questions from colleagues and a grueling inquiry by Columbia University.

headline.seo: Sudhir Venkatesh, Columbia’s Gang Scholar, Lives on the Edge
